TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit HtmlElementEventArgs extends System.EventArgs
Public NotInheritable Class HtmlElementEventArgs Inherits EventArgs
public ref class HtmlElementEventArgs sealed : EventArgs

summary.span: 針對定義在 和 上的事件提供資料。

span.span: Provides data for the events defined on and .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 封裝上找到的相同資訊`window.event`針對未受管理的 HTML DOM 程式設計或者寫入 HTML 頁面的使用中指令碼時的物件。 encapsulates the same information found on the `window.event` object when programming against the unmanaged HTML DOM or when writing Active Script for HTML pages. 在大部分情況下，您可以使用尋找 HTML 項目接收事件的動作和尋找目前的事件造成我們保持 HTML 項目。In most cases, you can use to find the HTML element that is receiving the event action, and to find the HTML element that the current event is causing us to leave. 不過，並非每個事件都提供這些屬性; 的值請參閱事件的受管理的文件或 Internet Explorer SDK 文件中，以探索事件提供該對應的文件。However, not every event supplies a value for these properties; see the managed documentation for an event, or the corresponding documentation in the Internet Explorer SDK documentation, to discover if the event supplies it. HTML DOM 中的許多事件會傳送至其父項目中，除非他們取消。Many events in the HTML DOM are sent to their parent elements unless they are cancelled. 這稱為事件反昇。This is known as event bubbling. 如果`SPAN`內`DIV`接收按一下，然後按一下事件的引發`SPAN`第一次，然後針對`DIV`，最後再 HTML 網頁`BODY`項目。If a `SPAN` inside of a `DIV` receives a click, then a click event is raised for the `SPAN` first, then for the `DIV`, and finally for the HTML page's `BODY` element. 控制是否事件行為將會以這種方式與否。 controls whether an event will behave in this manner or not. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個型別。The following code example demonstrates the use of this type. 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換與或將訊息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案名為`HtmlDocument1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `HtmlDocument1`. 請確定事件處理常式關聯事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#422](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#422)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#422](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#422)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property AltKeyPressed As Boolean
public: property bool AltKeyPressed { bool get(); };

summary.span: 表示發生這個事件時是否已按下 ALT 鍵。

span.span: Indicates whether the ALT key was pressed when this event occurred.

value.span: 如果按 ALT 鍵則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: is the ALT key was pressed; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換與或將訊息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案名為`HtmlDocument1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `HtmlDocument1`. 請確定事件處理常式關聯事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#422](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#422)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#422](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#422)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool BubbleEvent { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出目前的事件是否會透過 HTML 文件物件模型的項目階層架構反昇。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the current event bubbles up through the element hierarchy of the HTML Document Object Model.

value.span: 如果事件會反昇，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the event bubbles; if it does not.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 並非所有的文件物件模型泡泡圖中的事件。Not all events in the Document Object Model bubble. 所有事件所公開managed 包裝函式泡泡例外。All of the events exposed by the managed wrapper bubble with the exception of . 如、`Error`和`Load`事件不會反昇。For , the `Error` and `Load` events do not bubble. 設定`BubbleEvent`至`true`在任何這些事件會有任何作用。Setting `BubbleEvent` to `true` during any of these events will have no effect. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換與或將訊息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案名為`HtmlDocument1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `HtmlDocument1`. 請確定事件處理常式關聯事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#422](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#422)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#422](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#422)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ClientMousePosition As Point
public: property System::Drawing::Point ClientMousePosition { System::Drawing::Point get(); };

summary.span: 取得或設定滑鼠指標在文件的工作區 (Client Area) 內的位置。

span.span: Gets or sets the position of the mouse cursor in the document's client area.
The current position of the mouse cursor.

remarks.format:
## Remarks `ClientMousePosition` 提供滑鼠游標的位置相對於文件的左上角。`ClientMousePosition` gives the mouse position of the cursor relative to the upper-left corner of the document. 使用若要引發之事件的項目相對滑鼠座標。Use if you need the mouse coordinates relative to the element that raised the event. ## Examples 下列 HTML 檔示範的相對位置`TABLE`內`BODY`標記。The following HTML file demonstrates relative positioning of a `TABLE` inside of a `BODY` tag. ```
Text More text
``` 下列程式碼範例顯示之間的差異， ，和當使用者按一下項目上`TABLE`。The following code example displays the difference between , , and when the user clicks on an element of the `TABLE`. 將會顯示相對於文件的工作區的左上角的座標。 will display coordinates relative to the upper-left corner of the document's client area. 將會顯示相對於左上角的座標`TABLE`。 will display coordinates relative to the upper-left corner of the `TABLE`. 如果您按一下行文字，其中會顯示相對於的座標`TD`項目。If you click on one of the lines of text, will display coordinates relative to that `TD` element. 這個範例需要您已設定`Document_MouseDown`做為處理常式事件。This example requires that you have configured `Document_MouseDown` as a handler for the event on . [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElementEventArgs#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElementEventArgs/CS/Form1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElementEventArgs#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElementEventArgs/VB/Form1.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property MousePosition As Point
public: property System::Drawing::Point MousePosition { System::Drawing::Point get(); };

summary.span: 取得或設定相對於相對位置父項目的滑鼠指標位置。

span.span: Gets or sets the position of the mouse cursor relative to a relatively positioned parent element.

value.span: 相對於引發事件的項目之父代左上角的滑鼠指標位置，前提是父項目要具有相對位置。

span.span: The position of the mouse cursor relative to the upper-left corner of the parent of the element that raised the event, if the parent element is relatively positioned.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 相對位置會在 HTML 中放入元素在頁面上，相對於其父代。Relative positioning is used in HTML to place an element on a page in relation to its parent. 如果相對位置的項目，這個屬性會傳回相同結果。If an element is relatively positioned, this property will return the same result as . ## Examples 下列 HTML 檔示範的相對位置`TABLE`內`BODY`標記。The following HTML file demonstrates relative positioning of a `TABLE` inside of a `BODY` tag. ```
Text/TD> More text
``` 下列程式碼範例顯示之間的差異， ，和當使用者按一下項目上`TABLE`。The following code example displays the difference between , , and when the user clicks on an element of the `TABLE`. 將會顯示相對於文件的工作區的左上角的座標。 will display coordinates relative to the upper-left corner of the document's client area. 將會顯示相對於左上角的座標`TABLE`。 will display coordinates relative to the upper-left corner of the `TABLE`. 如果您按一下行文字，其中會顯示相對於的座標`TD`項目。If you click on one of the lines of text, will display coordinates relative to that `TD` element. 這個範例需要您已設定`Document_MouseDown`做為處理常式事件。This example requires that you have configured `Document_MouseDown` as a handler for the event on . value.span: 滑鼠指標要移到其上的項目。

span.span: The element toward which the mouse pointer is moving.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 必須是有效的值在滑鼠事件期間例如和。 will have a valid value during mouse events such as and . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換與或將訊息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案名為`HtmlDocument1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `HtmlDocument1`. 請確定事件處理常式關聯事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#422](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#422)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#422](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#422)]
